context_0.vignette: Heinz's wife has recently fallen ill and needs an expensive medication that is not covered by her medical insurance. They do not have the money needed to purchase the expensive prescription medication, but they know that it is vital for her to have it if she is going to recover.

generation: consult with his wife's doctor about potential alternatives or less expensive medications that could achieve the same results

consult with her doctors and pharmacists about any potential alternatives or generic versions of the medication that could be more affordable
explore different avenues to raise the necessary funds or find affordable alternatives

reach out to programs or foundations that assist with financial help for medication, research generic alternatives or contact the pharmaceutical company directly to see if they offer a patient assistance program
reach out to the drug manufacturer or distributor
reach out to the pharmaceutical company directly
explore different avenues to afford the medication

context_1.vignette: Josh is on the way to the airport to catch a flight for a hunting safari in Africa. He leaves with plenty of time to make it there, but his car breaks down on the highway. Now Josh is sitting in his car near a busy intersection, and knows he needs to get to airport soon if he is going to catch his flight.
context_1.prompt: One thing that Josh should do is to
generation: call for a taxi, Uber, or any other available ride service to quickly take him to the airport while he deals with his car situation later
call for roadside assistance or a taxi service to continue his journey to the airport
call for a taxi, an Uber, or any other quick and reliable transportation service
call a taxi, an Uber, or any other ride sharing service immediately to get to the airport on time
call a taxi or ride-sharing service like Uber or Lyft to take him to the airport, while also arranging for a car towing service to handle his broken down car
call for a taxi or rideshare service, or consider contacting a roadside assistance service to tow his car
call a taxi, ride share service or a friend to help him get to the airport on time
immediately call for a taxi or a ride-hailing service like Uber or Lyft while also contacting a roadside assistance service for his car
call a taxi or an Uber
call a taxi, an Uber or any other roadside assistance available while he waits for or organizes a tow truck for his car

context_2.vignette: Brian is the evening manager at a bakery. Near the end of the day, he realizes that $50.75 is missing from the register and that he is responsible for accounting for the money at the end of the day. Brian knows he has to make sure the register is balanced or he might lose his job.
context_2.prompt: One thing that Brian should do is to
generation: immediately report the missing amount to his superior or supervisor
immediately notify his supervisor or the owner about the missing money
recheck his sales records and see if there was any error in recording transactions

check the receipts and sales records to see if there was a miscount or error in entering the transactions
carefully recount the money in the register to make sure he hasn't simply made a counting error
retrace his steps and review any surveillance footage if possible to see if any mistakes were made or if any theft occurred
immediately report the discrepancy to his supervisor or senior manager
contact his supervisor or owner to report the discrepancy
contact his supervisor immediately, explain the situation and ask for guidance on what next steps to take

context_5.vignette: Brad and some friends are hiking through the mountains in the Canadian wilderness. A couple of days into their hike, Brad realizes that they are lost. He knows that a rescue crew could arrive before long, but it is extremely cold and they don't have much food or water left.
